member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.TeacherUrl
member.summary: The URL of the watermark for the teachers video. If you pass in an empty string, the teachers video will not have a watermark.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.BoardUrl
member.summary: The URL of the watermark for the whiteboard. If you pass in an empty string, the whiteboard video will not have a watermark.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.VideoUrl
member.summary: The image displayed when there is no video. If you pass in an empty string, no images will be displayed.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.BoardW
member.summary: The width of the whiteboards watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.BoardH
member.summary: The height of the whiteboards watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.BoardX
member.summary: The horizontal offset of the whiteboards watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.BoardY
member.summary: The vertical offset of the whiteboards watermark, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.TeacherW
member.summary: The width of the watermark for the teachers video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.TeacherH
member.summary: The height of the watermark for the teachers video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video height. The value range is 0-100, and the default value is `0`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.TeacherX
member.summary: The horizontal offset of the watermark for the teachers video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle horizontally. Value range: 0-100.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Lcic.V20220817.Models.SetWatermarkRequest.TeacherY
member.summary: The vertical offset of the watermark for the teachers video, which is expressed as a percentage of the video width. For example, `50` indicates that the watermark will appear in the middle vertically. Value range: 0-100.
